title: ppc64le: Fails to build 1.14.0 with lots of E0554 and a Segmentation Fault on Ubuntu

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
I am clone and trying to build tag 1.14.0 on Ubuntu ppc64le but fails with lots of:
```
error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
```
at `src/libcore/lib.rs`

I am running the following commands:

```
git clone https://github.com/rust-lang/rust && cd rust 
git checkout 1.14.0 
./configure && make -j16
```
But build fails. Backtrace:
```
error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:70:1
   |
70 | #![feature(allow_internal_unstable)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:71:1
   |
71 | #![feature(asm)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:72:1
   |
72 | #![feature(associated_type_defaults)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:73:1
   |
73 | #![feature(cfg_target_feature)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:74:1
   |
74 | #![feature(concat_idents)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:75:1
   |
75 | #![feature(const_fn)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:76:1
   |
76 | #![feature(cfg_target_has_atomic)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:77:1
   |
77 | #![feature(custom_attribute)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:78:1
   |
78 | #![feature(fundamental)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:79:1
   |
79 | #![feature(inclusive_range_syntax)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:80:1
   |
80 | #![feature(intrinsics)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:81:1
   |
81 | #![feature(lang_items)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:82:1
   |
82 | #![feature(no_core)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:83:1
   |
83 | #![feature(on_unimplemented)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:84:1
   |
84 | #![feature(optin_builtin_traits)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:85:1
   |
85 | #![feature(reflect)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:86:1
   |
86 | #![feature(unwind_attributes)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:87:1
   |
87 | #![feature(repr_simd, platform_intrinsics)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:88:1
   |
88 | #![feature(rustc_attrs)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:89:1
   |
89 | #![feature(specialization)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:90:1
   |
90 | #![feature(staged_api)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:91:1
   |
91 | #![feature(unboxed_closures)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:92:21
   |
92 | #![cfg_attr(stage0, feature(question_mark))]
   |                     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:93:1
   |
93 | #![feature(never_type)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error[E0554]: #[feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
  --> src/libcore/lib.rs:94:1
   |
94 | #![feature(prelude_import)]
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Segmentation fault

```
